languages.text: "Губернатор едва сидит в седле — странно для местной знати".
"The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор едва сидит в седле — странно для местной знати".

languages.text: "Der Gouverneur hält sich nur mit viel Mühe im Sattel, was für einen hiesigen Adeligen sonderbar ist."
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gouverneur hält sich nur mit viel Mühe im Sattel, was für einen hiesigen Adeligen sonderbar ist."

languages.text: « Ce gouverneur est à peine capable de tenir en selle, ce qui me semble étrange pour un noble de cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: « Ce gouverneur est à peine capable de tenir en selle, ce qui me semble étrange pour un noble de cette planète. »

languages.text: 「総督はどうにか鞍にしがみついているが、地元の貴族にしては妙なことだ」
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: 「総督はどうにか鞍にしがみついているが、地元の貴族にしては妙なことだ」

languages.text: «El gobernador apenas se sostiene en la silla, eso es raro en un noble local».
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador apenas se sostiene en la silla, eso es raro en un noble local».

languages.text: “那个总督居然连马都骑不稳，这对贵族而言相当古怪。”
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: “那个总督居然连马都骑不稳，这对贵族而言相当古怪。”

languages.text: "Buralardaki soyluların aksine vali, at üzerinde durmayı bile beceremiyor."
languages.original_text: "The governor barely manages to stay in his saddle, which is odd for a local nobleman."

traits.locale_text: "Buralardaki soyluların aksine vali, at üzerinde durmayı bile beceremiyor."
